amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the $5 million in funding for the Military Construction, Defense-Wide portion of the OCO account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the paragraph providing funding for Military Construction, Defense-Wide in Title IV of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 64 - 360 (Roll no. 220).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 64 - 360 (Roll no. 220).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Mulvaney.
